import {Grid, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react' import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' function AddANewGym({ onGymFormSubmit }) { const initialData = { name: '', address: '', image: '' } const [formData, setFormData] = useState() function handleChange(e) { const{ name, value} = e.target setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}) } let history = useHistory(); function handleSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch('/gyms/new', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(onGymFormSubmit) // .then(setFormData(initialData)) history.push('/') } return(

Have your own gym? Add it the list!
) } export default AddANewGym
